gulp.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to swallow large quantities of food or drink quickly
gulp.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She gulped down her breakfast and ran for the bus.
gulp.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to swallow suddenly because you are surprised or nervous
gulp.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I gulped when I saw the bill.
gulp.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to breathe in large amounts of air quickly
gulp.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: We rushed outside and gulped in the sweet fresh air.
gulp.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a large amount of something that you swallow quickly, or the action of swallowing
gulp.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Charlie drank the whisky in one gulp.
He took a huge gulp of brandy.
gulp.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a large amount of air that you breathe in quickly
